articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: China's new coronavirus cases trend lower
articles.description: China reported 45 new coronavirus cases in the mainland, down from 54 on the previous day, with all but one involving travellers from overseas, the country's health authority said.
articles.content:
China reported 45 new coronavirus cases in the mainland, down from 54 on the previous day, with all but one involving travellers from overseas, the country's health authority said. 
In the last seven days, China has reported 313 imported cases of coronavirus… [+4133 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Yarde says his father died from coronavirus
articles.description: British boxer Anthony Yarde has announced that his father has died of coronavirus.
articles.content:
British boxer Anthony Yarde has announced that his father has died of coronavirus.
The 28-year-old fighter, who said his father had been "fit with no health issues", urged people to stay at home to help combat the spread of the virus in a statement released … [+962 chars]
